metadata.title: Sandbaggers Galia Women's Golf Sandals
features: Molded orthotic footbed with 2 adjustable zig-zag straps.
Padded leather heel with narrow and flexible woven straps.
Plastic shank provides torsion control and our StepSaver orthotic helps to reduce foot fatigue.
Thermal rubber (TR) sole ensures soft-flex traction with a cleated spike-less design.
description: Introducing Galia, Sandbaggers' new skinny-strap golf sandal. These comfortable sandals have a molded orthotic footbed with spike-less soles, and are now available in four colors, allowing you to put together the perfect outfit for both on and off the course.
